posts.post_title: FS: NEW 19 Card Low Grade T206 Lot w/ HOF's & VG+ Titus **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Beckley - $35
Bradley - $12
Downey - $10
Fromme - $11
Raymond - $15
Titus - $225 (extremely light surface wrinkles on front center)
Willis - $33
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Nice Titus now $225.  Thanks for looking!
